mapper.select:
select a.`menu_id` as `menuId`, a.`menu_name` as `menuName`, a.`parent_menu_id` as `parentMenuId`, a.`menu_url` as `menuUrl`, a.`sort` as `sort`, a.`visible` as `visible` from menu a
a.`menu_id` = #{menuId} and
a.`menu_name` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{menuName}), '%') and
a.`parent_menu_id` = #{parentMenuId} and
a.`menu_url` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{menuUrl}), '%') and
a.`sort` = #{sort} and
a.`visible` = #{visible} and
